last_episode_to_air.name: A Decision
last_episode_to_air.overview: Alicia focuses her energy on unmasking the mastermind behind the leaked video and Cesar’s assault. Malen makes a momentous career decision.

name: Intimacy
overview: A rising politician's career is threatened when a surreptitiously recorded video of her sex life is leaked to the public.

episodes.name: Lethal Media
episodes.overview: Mayoral candidate Malen is publicly scorned when a secretly recorded intimate video is leaked. High school teacher Begona receives tragic news.

episodes.name: Position/Exposure
episodes.overview: Alicia interrogates Ane’s former co-workers. When Malen’s political party punishes her for what she said at the recent press conference, she retaliates.

episodes.name: Prosopagnosia
episodes.overview: In the past, Malen and Cesar begun their ill-fated but passionate affair, and Ane suffers constantly from her co-workers harassment.

episodes.name: The Fall
episodes.overview: Begona reaches out to one of Ane’s exes as she tries to learn more about her sister’s past. Malen is shaken by the news about Cesar.

episodes.name: Acting
episodes.overview: Malen steps into her new role. Leire worries about whether Xabi will seek revenge. Begona gets frustrated during a visit to Ane’s former factory.

episodes.name: Alone
episodes.overview: After meeting with Ane’s psychologist, Begona takes action with an unexpected ally. Alicia investigates Malen’s case as the mayor receives new threats.

episodes.name: Tomorrow
episodes.overview: When a violent incident involving Leire occurs, Malen questions her own actions. Alicia attempts to track down Ane’s ex. Miren seeks dirt on Gorka.

episodes.name: A Decision
episodes.overview: Alicia focuses her energy on unmasking the mastermind behind the leaked video and Cesar’s assault. Malen makes a momentous career decision.
